content: Yes, both the Apple iPad Pro and Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 are compatible with Adobe software like Photoshop and Illustrator. You can download and use these applications on tablets to create digital art, edit photos, and design graphics. However, it's essential to keep in mind that some features may be limited or different from the desktop version of these applications. It's always a good idea to make sure you have enough storage space and a powerful processor to run Adobe software smoothly on tablets.
